hooks.prompt:
After completing this turn, update context if code/docs were modified:

## CURRENT.md 업데이트 (변경사항 있을 때만)
If you modified files this turn, update `.gsd/CURRENT.md`:
- **Active Task**: Current task description
- **Working Files**: List files you edited/created
- **Decisions Made**: Quick notes on decisions (1-2 lines)
- **Blockers**: Any blockers encountered
- Update `*Session started:*` line with current timestamp

## PATTERNS.md (중요 패턴 발견 시)
If you discovered a reusable pattern, add 1 bullet to `.gsd/PATTERNS.md` (max 20 items, 2KB).

Skip if this turn was only reading/exploring.

Session is ending. Perform these tasks:

## 1. Memory Graph 요약 저장
Call `store_memory` with:
- type: "session-summary"
- title: "Session: [brief description]"
- content: What was built/changed, key decisions, patterns. Keep under 500 chars.
- tags: ["session-learnings", "auto"]

## 2. CHANGELOG 요약 추가 (변경사항이 있는 경우)
Read `.gsd/CHANGELOG.md`, find the most recent entry (marked with today's date and session ID), and add a '#### 요약' section with 1-2 sentences describing the changes.

Note: CURRENT.md is updated during Stop hooks. It will be reviewed at next session start.

Skip all if the session was trivial (only reading/exploring, no code or doc changes).
